title: The Homage5 GT vario in detail
content:
Frame colour
                            
                            
                                night*; warm silver*
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Suspension fork
                            
                            
                                Federgabel Fox AWL 34, Air, 120mm
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Rear shock
                            
                            
                                Fox Float Rhythm SV 165x45
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Seatpost
                            
                            
                                Dropper Post X-Fusion Manic 100; Dropper Post X-Fusion Manic 125*
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Tires
                            
                            
                                Schwalbe Super Moto-X 62-584 Reflex; Schwalbe Johnny Watts 365 60-584*
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Tubes
                            
                            
                                Schwalbe AV21
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Rims
                            
                            
                                Rodi Tryp35 Evo 27,5"
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Spokes
                            
                            
                                Sapim Leader 2,0 mm, Inox, black ( 16x ); Sapim Leader 2,0 mm, Inox, black ( 36x )
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Front hub
                            
                            
                                Novatec Boost, QR, 32H
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Rear hub
                            
                            
                                Enviolo Heavy Duty
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Battery
                            
                            
                                Akku Bosch PowerTube 800 horizontal; Bosch PowerMore 250*
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Display
                            
                            
                                Bosch Kiox 500*; Bosch Purion 200*; Bosch SmartphoneGrip*
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Crankset
                            
                            
                                Samox, 165 mm
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Chain ring
                            
                            
                                60T
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Chain guard
                            
                            
                                Chain guard
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Chain
                            
                            
                                Gates drive belt CDX
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Pinion
                            
                            
                                26T, for Gates drive belt CDX
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Saddle
                            
                            
                                Ergon SF10 Gel; Selle Royal New Lookin Male Eco*
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Pedals
                            
                            
                                VP R&M Custom; VP-538*
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Shifter
                            
                            
                                Enviolo grip shift Twist Display Pure, continuous
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Handlebar
                            
                            
                                Satori R&M Custom, 25,4mm, Alu; Satori R&M Custom Komfort, 25,4 mm, Alu*
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Stem
                            
                            
                                Satori R&M Custom, cable integration, adjustable angle, Alu
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Grips
                            
                            
                                Ergon ergonomic
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Brakes
                            
                            
                                Tektro TRP HD-EU835 disc brake; Magura MT C ABS*
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Front light
                            
                            
                                Supernova M99 Mini Pro-25
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Tail light
                            
                            
                                Supernova TL3 Pro
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Mudguards
                            
                            
                                Curana Orbit 70
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Luggage rack
                            
                            
                                Riese & Müller
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Rubber
                            
                            
                                Bibia
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Bell
                            
                            
                                Knog OI V2
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Kickstand
                            
                            
                                Ursus R90 Mooi Plus ANS
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Lock
                            
                            
                                ABUS Granit Xplus
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Pump
                            
                            
                                Beto air suspension fork pump
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                RX Hardware
                            
                            
                                RX Chip (für RX Services)*
                            
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                            
                                Frame size [cm]
                            
                            
                                47 cm*; 51 cm*; 56 cm*
